Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Rockwell
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Western, Jackson, California, and Madison due to, street blockage at Madison/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Madison, Western, Jackson, California, and Madison due to, street blockage at Madison/Rockwell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed near 47th
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near 47th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near 47th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Roosevelt and 63rd to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #29 State buses to connect North- and South-bound service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
